readable.title: 3318564834_4ccea90497
readable.content: A boy pauses in drawing on a white balloon to smile at the camera , and the girl next to him also smiles at the camera . A brunette boy and girl smile for the camera while drawing faces on a white balloon . A girl is smiling and a young man is drawing on a white balloon . Two smiling people with dark hair . Two young adults smile at the camera .
